oai_dc:dc.dc:title: PARTICIPATIVE TECHNOLOGIES TO IMPROVE DIETS IN MEXICO AND FOR ADAPTATION TO CLIMATE CHANGE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schwentesius, Rita
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: It is necessary to boost a series of measures and policies to help peoples search for a new balance in the growth of civilization while reducing starvation and malnourishment, using new production and technological strategies that may help humankind and societies, not only to recover their food self-sufficiency, but also, based on a new relationship between age-old knowledge and technology, to put a stop on environmental deterioration which allows humanity to revert climate change, as well as to preserve agro environments that have helped people preserve and reproduce as a species on the planet.
